txt.en: Listen to the Orc factions.
Gazathrug falls in combat
Talk to Hetbrúda.
Now is the time to take on the last few remaining hobgoblins!
'We need to hide. Quickly, behind the large mirror!'
Talk to Gazathrug
Talk to Hetbrúda
Defeat Gazathrug.
Gazathrug, still breathing, beckons you closer
Find a good location to spy on the Orcs
Gazathrug picks himself up, sword in hand, to die in battle
Defeat the remaining hobgoblins.
A large group of Orcs gathers close to here!
Talk to Gazathrug.
'Come, [placeholder], let us continue to the Steepset. While at Imrêkh-guthlu I overheard that dwarves had secured Zidir-nesad.'

'Come closer, [placeholder].

'I should've died by those hobgoblins. Your interference was warranted, however. The hobgoblins would have reported back of my loss and too soon would these halls of Vok-kasol fall to the Frost-horde. You made sure they didn't make it, and for that I commend you.

'Now, I must die with honour and for Gorgar. I can't die slowly upon this stone. No, I must be killed in combat. Grant me this last wish, [placeholder].'
A group of Orcs led by Gazathrug has converged with a group of hobgoblins
Gazathrug's fear of losing the Upper Reaches of Máttugard are quite warranted.
Defeat Gazathrug
Listen to the Orc factions
Find a good location to spy on the Orcs.
Instance: Battle For the Upper Reaches
Defeat the remaining hobgoblins
